tool_description: API that provides the latest news about the conflict between Ukraine and Russia.
name: News on Ukraine - Russia Conflict
title: News on Ukraine - Russia Conflict

api_list.name: Get Individual News Sources
api_list.description: Gets news about Ukraine Russia conflict from a specific news resource. The search parameters are: guardian, telegraph, times, bbc, reuters, usatoday, nytimes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://news-on-ukraine-russia-conflict.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-on-ukraine-russia-conflict.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://news-on-ukraine-russia-conflict.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-on-ukraine-russia-conflict.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about the conflict between Ukraine and Russia from all over the world.
